response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which we believe holds immense value and can significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, we estimate its worth to be over $800,000. Considering its high quality and potential impact on your projects, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 750000}
